content:
CS 162 - Formal Languages and Automata Theory

Professor: Michael T. Goodrich, DBH 4091
Office hours: TTh 3:30-4:30pm, DBH 4091 (shared)
(physical/electronic meetings can also be scheduled via email)

Lectures: TTh 2:00-3:20pm, EH 1200
Discussion sessions: Wednesdays, 6:00-6:50pm, SSH 100

TA: Daniel Frishberg
Office hours: Monday, 4-5pm, Tuesday, 4-5pm, Friday, 3-4pm, CS 464B

Grader (aka Reader): Meng-Hsuan Chiang
Office hours: TBA

Grader (aka Reader): Satish Kotti
Office hours: TBA

  • Announcement(s):

    • If you would like additional practice with concepts of this class, please visit The RASCO Online Automata Judge.
    • Midterm I: Thursday, April 25, in class Reading: Chapters 0-1, Section 2.1
      There is a set of Study Questions available.
      There is also a Previous Midterm 1 available.
    • Midterm II: Thursday, May 16, in class Reading: Sections 2.1-2.3, 3.1-3.2, 4.1.
      There is a set of Study Questions available.
      There is also a Previous Midterm 2 available.
    • Final (comprehensive): Thursday, June 6, in class. Reading: Course notes for weeks 1-9 and Sipser chapters 0-1, Sections 2.1-2.3, 3.1-3.3, 4.1-4.2, 5.1-5.2, 7.1-7.5
      There is a set of Study Questions available.
      There is also a Previous Final Exam available.
